      void onDeath()
      Run at end of battle (Optional)
      Enemy setAILevel(byte level)
      Sets the enemy's AI level (0-2) 0 = random move 1 = uses players weakness to decide best move 2 = uses players health to decide best move if bigger than 2, it will be set to 2

      Sets the enemy's item drop

      • setAILevel

        public Enemy setAILevel(byte level)
        Sets the enemy's AI level (0-2) 0 = random move 1 = uses players weakness to decide best move 2 = uses players health to decide best move if bigger than 2, it will be set to 2
